entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
